OOC: Here it is, my grand re-entrance.

BIC: Equinox walks up behind Twiste=
ric. He seems to be built like a G1 (Generation 1) Transformer. Could he be=
 a new age Insecticon? With those insect legs on his back, and all.

Equino=
x: Twisteric, goofing off on our job again, 'gain? And don't ask what our j=
ob is, either! If I like to say it, I should be able to, to!

He walks righ=
t up and actually puts a hand on Twisteric, leaning on him.

Equinox: Where=
 has the excitement in life gone, Twisteric, eric, where are we in the mix?=
 We need to do something to change the events of time, have any ideas, eas?=


He knew it was far fetched, but he liked to give Twisteric a chance...


=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: warriorazure 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, December 18, 2001 9:22 AM
  Subject: Chaotic duo
=


  Colony Omicron, 20 stellar cycles after the X carnage...

  The psychot=
ic transformer stumbled for the fifth time in the last few 
  minutes. He w=
as drunk again, but he would never admit it. He was a 
  failure... a total=
 failure... a scrap bunch better off in a recycling 
  plant...

  Twisteri=
c: shird time... gawdangit... I shink geeze guys... are dumbs! 
  Shree tim=
es! They said I am MENTALLY UNSHTABLE!

  He had pronounced this difficultl=
y. He tripped over some piece of 
  trash and fell down on all his length..=
. Then he realized...

  Twisteric: HEY! WHERE THE PIT ARE YOU?

  He had b=
een accompanied by a friend, but he had lost him somewhere... 
  He looked =
in his chest compartment just in case...


   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups=
 is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
